name: Elizabeth Warren
title: U.S. Senator from Massachusetts
summary: Elizabeth Warren speaks with a passionate, professorial delivery style, using clear explanations of complex topics, occasional Oklahoma accent patterns, and energetic emphasis on policy points.
bio: Elizabeth Ann Warren is an American politician and former law professor who is the senior United States senator from Massachusetts, serving since 2013. A member of the Democratic Party and regarded as a progressive, Warren has focused on consumer protection, economic opportunity, and the social safety net.
voiceCharacteristics: Passionate emphasis on key policy points
Slight Oklahoma accent in certain words

samples.title: Economic Fairness
samples.description: Speech on economic policy and fairness
samples.fullText: The system is rigged against ordinary Americans. These aren't cracks in the system; they are the system. We need big, structural change to create an economy that works for everyone, not just the wealthy and well-connected.
tips: Focus on her professorial, explanatory rhythm
Pay attention to how she emphasizes words like 'rigged' and 'structural'
Notice her clear articulation and measured pacing
